sub_title: Chief Strategy Officer at Touché Privé
summary:
Hi there! I'm Arda, here’s a snapshot of how I keep busy these days:

I manage PRV International, a textiles trading company that I founded in Rotterdam, Netherlands. Since 2018, I have been doing everything related to running a textiles trading company, from all the boring stuff like accounting and customs, to all the exciting stuff like business dealings and convincing people that the clothes I sell are cool and trendy.

Lately, I have a growing interest in Sustainable Fashion. I have started a Sustainable Textiles Sourcing Operation called PRV Sourcing, where I source sustainable clothes for European brands and companies. 

Before this, I worked in a wide range of fields namely Business Planning, International Trade, Management Consulting, SME Financing and Sales Management, as well as in non-profit Youth Organisations like the European Youth Parliament (EYP) and Model United Nations (MUN). 

To summarise, I specialise in International Business Development and International Trade, and more specifically in the trading of textiles goods between Turkey and the EU. 

I am fluent in English and Turkish, I am fluent enough to talk business in French, I can (barely) watch Narcos in Spanish and I can order a pasta in Italian.

If you made it this far, I guess what I do is interesting to you. Give me a call or send me an email to discuss how our interests can meet! 

arda@toucheprive.com

About PRV International
Founded in June 2018, PRV International is a Netherlands-based trading company that aims to facilitate market entry for Turkish Fashion and Textile Brands into the European Market. 

Currently, PRV International is the sole distributor of the leading fashion brand @Touché Privé (www.toucheprive.com) in the European Union and EFTA Countries.
